TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PermissionSetAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class PermissionSetAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許使用宣告式安全性，將 的安全性動作套用到程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for a to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性， ，和互為獨佔模式，這表示有權限集合時，可以當做其來源的下列其中之一： 的具名權限集合，包含的 XML 表示的檔案設定權限，或設定字串，包含使用權限的 XML 表示法。The properties , , and are mutually exclusive, meaning that a permission set can have as its source only one of the following: a named permission set, a file containing an XML representation of a permission set, or a string containing an XML representation of a permission set. 宣告所允許的範圍需視用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. A對就相當於在每個集合內的權限執行該動作。A performed on a is the equivalent of performing that action on each of the permissions within the set. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，為使用對應的權限類別。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用類別。The following example shows the use of the Class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/CS/permissionsetattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的安全性動作，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified security action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用這個方法。它是包含僅支援來自繼承。This method is not used; it is included only to support inheritance from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.PermissionSet CreatePermissionSet() cil managed

summary.span: 根據這個權限集屬性物件，建立並傳回新的權限集。

span.span: Creates and returns a new permission set based on this permission set attribute object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會由應用程式程式碼應該只能由安全性系統，呼叫這個方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 屬性可用在編譯時期轉換中繼資料的序列化形式的安全性宣告。Attributes are used at compile time to convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從權限物件，這個方法會傳回對應於這個屬性的執行個體。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission object that this method returns, which corresponds to this attribute instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ File { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定含有要被宣告的自訂使用權限之 XML 表示的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a file containing the XML representation of a custom permission set to be declared.

value.span: 檔案的實體路徑，含有使用權限集的 XML 表示。

span.span: The physical path to the file containing the XML representation of the permission set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的檔案為 Unicode，設定屬性`true`。If the file specified is Unicode, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性。The following code shows the use of the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/CS/permissionsetattribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Hex { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 編碼的使用權限集的十六進位表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the hexadecimal representation of the XML encoded permission set.

value.span: XML 編碼的使用權限集的十六進位表示。

span.span: The hexadecimal representation of the XML encoded permission set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用權限集的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the permission set.

value.span: 不變的 (包含在預設原則中而且無法變更的數個使用權限集的其中一個) 名稱。

span.span: The name of an immutable (one of several permission sets that are contained in the default policy and cannot be altered).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具名使用權限集合可以從電腦而異，因為使用宣告式安全性的具名使用權限集合僅限於包含做為預設原則的一部分的不可變的具名使用權限設定。Because named permission sets can vary from computer to computer, the use of named permission sets for declarative security is restricted to the immutable named permission sets included as part of the default policy. 這可確保設定參考的權限中所包含的權限將會相同只要執行程式碼。This ensures that the permissions contained in the permission set referenced will be the same wherever the code is run. 編譯器錯誤會擲回易變或無法辨認的具名權限集使用。A compiler error will be thrown if a mutable or unrecognized named permission set is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用屬性。The following code shows the use of the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/CS/permissionsetattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PermissionSetAttribute/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UnicodeEncoded { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指示由 所指定的檔案是 Unicode 或 ASCII 編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file specified by is Unicode or ASCII encoded.

value.span: 如果檔案是 Unicode 編碼，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the file is Unicode encoded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未設定這個屬性，則會假設檔案是 ASCII。If this property is not set, the file is assumed to be ASCII. 如果是`null`不使用這個屬性。If is `null` this property is not used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ XML { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用權限集的 XML 表示。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML representation of a permission set.

value.span: 使用權限集的 XML 表示。

span.span: The XML representation of a permission set.
